content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_slab
inventory=[{"type": "hopper_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 62, "index": 19}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 7, "index": 32}, {"type": "sponge", "quantity": 38, "index": 43}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 3, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a stone_slab, I first need to smelt cobblestone into stone. I have 3 cobblestone in slot 44, so I will smelt 1 of them into slot 11.
Ok
act: smelt from slot 44 to slot 11 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_slab
inventory=[{"type": "hopper_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 62, "index": 19}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 7, "index": 32}, {"type": "sponge", "quantity": 38, "index": 43}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 2, "index": 44}]
thought: I still need 2 more stone to craft a stone_slab, so I will smelt another cobblestone from slot 44 into slot 12.
Ok
act: smelt from slot 44 to slot 12 with quantity 1

thought: I still need 1 more stone to craft a stone_slab, so I will smelt another cobblestone from slot 44 into slot 13.
Ok
act: smelt from slot 44 to slot 13 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_slab
inventory=[{"type": "hopper_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 62, "index": 19}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 7, "index": 32}, {"type": "sponge", "quantity": 38, "index": 43}]
thought: Now that I have 3 stone, I can craft a stone_slab. I will move the stone from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "stone_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "hopper_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 62, "index": 19}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 7, "index": 32}, {"type": "sponge", "quantity": 38, "index": 43}]

TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_slab
inventory=[{"type": "stone_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "hopper_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 62, "index": 19}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 7, "index": 32}, {"type": "sponge", "quantity": 38, "index": 43}]
thought: Now that I have crafted a stone_slab, I can move it to a free slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 6
